sentences.sContent: He was affable at one moment, choleric the next.
sentences.sCn: 他时而友善和蔼，时而暴躁易怒。

synos.tran: 易怒的；暴躁的；胆汁质的

remMethod.val: choler(胆汁) + ic → 胆汁质的 → 易怒的, 暴躁的

trans.tranOther: A choleric person gets angry very easily. You can also use choleric to describe a person who is very angry.
